analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0xdd5b1e55fd47c039e0d72cc96a216b828cd8f498.sol:
	Contract BeeBitGold has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0xdd5b1e55fd47c039e0d72cc96a216b828cd8f498.sol#310)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0xdd5b1e55fd47c039e0d72cc96a216b828cd8f498.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/25/0xdd5b1e55fd47c039e0d72cc96a216b828cd8f498.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0xdd5b1e55fd47c039e0d72cc96a216b828cd8f498.sol#115) is not in mixedCase
